### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Damage Nearby When Hit

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/damage_nearby_when_hit)

Damages other nearby entities with the initial hit's damage upon the power holder being damaged.

Type ID: `apugli:damage_nearby_when_hit`




---

### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Damage Nearby When Hit

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/damage_nearby_when_hit)

Damages other nearby entities with the initial hit's damage upon the power holder being damaged.

Type ID: `apugli:damage_nearby_when_hit`




---

damage_condition.description: If specified, the damage condition required for this power to act upon damaging an entity.
damage_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the damage condition required for this power to act upon damaging an entity.

damage_type.description: The damage type used to deal damage to the nearby entities.
damage_type.markdownDescription: The damage type used to deal damage to the nearby entities.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the damage value dealt to the nearby entities.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the damage value dealt to the nearby entities.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the damage value dealt to the nearby entities.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the damage value dealt to the nearby entities.

attacker_self_bientity_condition.description: If set, this condition must be met with the attacker as the actor and the power holder as the target to apply damage to nearby entities.
attacker_self_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this condition must be met with the attacker as the actor and the power holder as the target to apply damage to nearby entities.

attacker_nearby_bientity_condition.description: If set, this condition must be met with the attacker as the actor and an entity that should be damaged by this power as the target to apply damage to that entity.
attacker_nearby_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this condition must be met with the attacker as the actor and an entity that should be damaged by this power as the target to apply damage to that entity.

self_nearby_bientity_condition.description: If set, this condition must be met with the power holder as the actor and an entity that should be damaged by this power as the target to apply damage to that entity.
self_nearby_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this condition must be met with the power holder as the actor and an entity that should be damaged by this power as the target to apply damage to that entity.

radius.description: The radius in which this power will act.
radius.markdownDescription: The radius in which this power will act.
